detaileddescription.para: Note that the game data contains loops in delta links which mean recursive loading should be avoided

Handling animated and directional textures based on the game graphics data.

detaileddescription.para: These objects handle the drawing of regular textures to use a unit's direction and include delta graphics.
This type can also deal with playing position based game sounds.
